website_summaries.verdict: The best budget smart padlock meant for travel to keep luggage safe.
pros: Padlock design features an indicator light that detects and reveals when individuals have unlocked or tampered with it
Three-dial combination is easy to use
Flexible cable is easy to wrap around luggage
cons: Flexible cable on the top is too thick to fit through some zipper eyelets

customer_reviews.title: *** These locks have a terrible design flaw
customer_reviews.text: ***LOCK CAN BE OPENED WITH ANY PENCIL, PAPERCLIP, ETC.*** These locks have a terrible design flaw. You can use any sharp object to reset the combination while the locks are closed. That shouldn't be possible. This means anyone can reset the combination to whatever they wish and open your lock. Combination locks should NEVER be capable of being reset ***unless they are already unlocked***.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Undependable.
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking, feels solid, though the numbers are tiny and hard to read without my reading glasses. Worked perfectly on a trip to Europe. Packing for a second trip, the cable end looked distorted and I had a hard time fitting it into the hole. Eventually I pushed it in place and scrambled the numbers. It seemed secure. But my suitcase came off with airline carousel with the lock completely missing. Fortunately the contents were intact and did not look as thought they had been inspected. I would not buy this lock again -- it's not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieDepression

customer_reviews.title: Prevents tampering. Not Secure.
customer_reviews.text: Should change wording to Preventative. Not secure. These locks are made to "prevent" tampering in the 30 seconds to 1 minute that airport employees or TSA handle your luggage to the plane or back to luggage claim. Is it secure? No. Does it PREVENT tampering? Sure, for about 10-30 seconds. Was able to pick it within 10 seconds with a bendy plastic toothpick. Gave 3 stars for preventing tampering on my last flight. :-)
customer_reviews.author: SilentSamurai

customer_reviews.title: Good for a TSA lock.
customer_reviews.text: These offer the tamper indicator for the TSA master key, which is nice. That's probably the most likely route of attack for a luggage lock. However, these can be picked easily by simply pressing the release button on the lock and rotating the binding dial until it falls into a set. People are rating 1 star because of this, but it really isn't that bad. TSA locks are not security locks. It's good for making sure that your bag stays closed during handling and flight, but like all TSA locks, that's about it. Please for the love of God don't use these on gym lockers. Only use TSA locks when you legally have to.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Scam -use zip ties instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. 3/4 worked properly. When we used the 3 of them for the first time, mine was totally cut off and no note from TSA inside suitcase. Went to complain to airline they said TSA is notorious for cutting off locks and not even leaving a note in the suitcase. This product endorsed by TSA is a scam.Best advice was use ZipTies, a lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice visible numbers (white on black)
customer_reviews.text: Received the locks. Nice visible numbers (white on black), nice cables (with secure locking ends), easy to change combo, like the release button. Don't like the fact, with my eyes closed, I picked the combination in 10 seconds (and I am just an average person). Nice form, but worthless function. Very disappointed. I will have to keep looking or just use my existing locks and always keep reader glasses handy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane's Husband

customer_reviews.title: Keeps honest people from snooping and slows a dishonest person for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Combination can be solved in very short order by applying pressure to the release button and then turn the dial that is tight until you feel a loose spot, then repeat with the next tight dial, then the last.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Rated as one of the best, which is why I purchased the 2 pack ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: We used the locks on our recent trip. One of the locks was missing off the luggage, even though my husband checked the locks before our travel. Not sure how it disappeared, but cannot give it the 5 stars I originally gave it, because of this. Rated as one of the best, which is why I purchased the 2 pack lock. We haven’t used them yet. Our trip is in two weeks, but I don’t expect to have a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage lock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these again because they are the best locks for travel. The numbers are bigger than other locks, making it easy for my mom to see without putting on her glasses. The flexible locking arm is also very convenient if I want to lock multiple zipper pulls on a travel backpack. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn N

customer_reviews.title: "New" Tarriss Lock - Great improvements
customer_reviews.text: Long time owner of the older version of Tarriss luggage locks (w/ vertical # tumbler). My only complaint with the older version was the numbers were small and not easy to read. Note: The older version I own are still working great after hundreds of trips! The new version is simple to set, easy to read, with the same high quality feel as the older version. Based on my past experience with Tarriss locks, I'm confident this version will work dependably for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LP Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage locks
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these locks when they arrived. I expected them to be of better quality than those I traditionally see in the store. I have a SaddleBack Leather briefcase and large duffel bag that is closed with buckles. This is a difficult design to secure. These locks work perfectly, the cable can be run through the buckle holes in the leather strap prevent the buckle from being undone. The added feature of being able to tell when customs (or someone else) has unlocked your bag with a TSA key is an added bonus. I highly recommend these locks.
customer_reviews.author: Rick 2416

customer_reviews.title: Cable is Thick, May Not Fit Through Some Zipper Eyelet.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit through the eyelet of zippers on my bowling ball bag. I wish that I had tested them out before leaving for my trip. I have not tried them on a suitcase. I did try them on my Northface Backpack, and it barely fits through the eyelet of that zipper. Note, I am trying to fit the lock through the piece that holds the zipper pull tab, as the tab on the items that I mentioned does not have the traditional hole on the tab. The lock itself is GREAT, just was not used for what I intended it to be used for.
customer_reviews.author: an.GEL.ica

customer_reviews.title: secure traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought the new locks because of the issues I was having with my old locks. They were difficult to reset when TSA opened our luggage. On our last trip I used the new locks and one of them was opened by TSA. The reset process was very simple to do and the locks have been working fine so far. I did have a slight problem which was quickly solved by a represenatative at Tarriss. They said if they could not fix the problem, they would be happy to send me a new lock. Fortunate the problem was solved.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great lock and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple issues with the first lock and I'm so thankful for the helpful customer service. I received a new lock within a few days and everything worked perfectly. I've used the lock on two trips and my luggage was searched by TSA. Thankfully my lock was returned and it was helpful to have the search alert feature so you know immediately your luggage was searched. Back to the customer service, by far the best customer service team. I highly recommend the company and the TSA lock.
customer_reviews.author: April Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Works but easy to lose
customer_reviews.text: Lost both of these at the airport. Makes it easy for the TSA to open your luggage, but they don't seem to put them back on, or didn't put them on correctly. As they both disappeared. Trying to get re-imbursement from the TSA is impossible. I've noticed some suitcases now come with a built-in TSA lock. This is probably the better option so you don't lose them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and bright locks
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent locks. The cable is strong and can easily get through the tabs on your suitcase to lock it. They are also versatile enough to lock the main compartment of my backpack, which I like to do when running through the airport! They are also bright and bold (I am using the bright red color), with prominent numbers that are easy to read and put your combination in. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: R. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a TSA approved lock that I can use for my travels and ordered this very nice looking lock. It’s very easy to use, small enough to fit my luggage and TSA approved. I love it. It is nice to have a product that is priced right and fits what you need. I also appreciate their customer support. They follow up and make sure you are happy with what you got.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, liked it a lot. Felt like it kept my bag secure through all the hotels and porters during my trip. My only complaint is that on my return trip from Ireland, my bag arrived back home minus the lock. Don't know if it was removed by Irish security or American security. (I was told there was no TSA at Dublin airport so maybe that's why it was removed? No TSA to unlock and relock it?) Didn't like that my bag was vulnerable for the trip home, but I can't blame the lock. Next time, I will use a twist tie in addition to the lock. But the lock itself was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: These were great. Used them every day on a 10 day trip and they worked perfectly. Also really liked having the cable lock instead of metal because it allowed you to lock up your bag more specifically. I was traveling with a backpack and I could flex the cable through multiple zippers. It was great, really glad I had these. Another day I had to leave my shoes locked to the outside of my bag cuz they were dirty. True someone could have just cut them off but still it was easier than if I’d had a traditional lock.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good lock. Well made.  Easy to reprogram combination
customer_reviews.text: Used to detour quick backpack grabbers, not if someone had the time and serious desire to break it this won’t stop them. Unknown in how this would hold up for checked baggage, though could give piece of mind for random airport workers opening/snooping bag. I use to to detour random people looking for a quick grab of my backpack with laptop, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Q

customer_reviews.title: Work very well, easy to read, amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: These locks are excellent compared to most of the other travel locks I've tried. They're easy to lock and unlock, and I can read the numbers on the dials without my glasses (yeah, I know, time and gravity take no prisoners). I've had a number of Tarriss products, and their customer service is absolutely outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: SnouterShooter

customer_reviews.title: You can purchase these with confidence... you will be glad that you did!
customer_reviews.text: I used these locks for the first time in August of 2016. They are a perfect size, easy to use, easy to fit through different pull tabs... these are great! I really like that it has the indicator that TSA has opened my bag... and was evidenced when I got home, and found the indicator had changed from "green" to "red". There was a TSA note inside my bag, which matched the lock indicator. These have enough weight to them that you can tell they are well made. The tumblers work smoothly, as well as physically locking and unlocking. I would not hesitate to recommend these to anyone. I am super pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: TSA loses locks all the time because there is no ramifications for the actions. These are reasonable price, easy to read,easy to set, easy to use, if TSA would just relock them they would last a while. Our security is being done by people that can't figure out how to relock a lock that they have a key for. anyone find this a bit nuts
customer_reviews.author: Dieseldean

customer_reviews.title: The locks are great, except
customer_reviews.text: I use my TSA luggage locks to secure my archery bow case. I travel between six and ten times a year to various locations to shoot archery tournaments and I need to fly on airlines to get there. In one out of five flights when I retrieve my bow case one of the locks is missing, I use two locks. This has happened about four times now. I do make sure the locks are secure when I attach them. Is it the rough treatment from the baggage handlers or the baggage carousels? I don't know. Other than that this locks are great and give me peace of mind when I am traveling.
customer_reviews.author: John Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Know if your bags have been looked through
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and secure locks. I love how the locks have a feature where the little red circle changes from green to red to show you if a TSA agent has opened the lock so you know if your bags have been checked and you can to check your belongings closely to make sure everything is still there. As far as I know only TSA agents have a key that can open these locks so you don’t have to worry about baggage handlers opening your luggage and stealing anything of value. I’ve used these locks when checking bags while traveling both domestically in the USA or abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Works as expected, Fair price for market.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid and well made. The casing is all metal and the cable is steel covered with plastic. The cable is small enough to fit through the zipper pulls perfectly. The release button has a solid feel to it. There is nothing about this lock makes me feel any lack of confidence that it will serve my needs for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: SenselessScott

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: These are the best luggage style locks I have seen. The numbers are much larger than most, with obvious stops for each number. The locks with smaller numbers are hard to read, and it's too easy to spin the dial past your desired stop. The cables could be easily cut with the right tool, but I think that applies to all locks of this type. These type locks are mostly a deterrent to a non-professional thief.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N Andrews

customer_reviews.title: They work on some bags but not mine!
customer_reviews.text: Okay they did work, just not the way they were designed. I couldn't not fit them through the zipper holes on my eBag roller/backpack. The diameter was just a bit too big on the locks. I don't know if that was a size problem with the locks or with my eBags. So I had to put them through the holes in the tabs, which I imagine wasn't as secure. BUT really these are meant as a deterrent and for that they worked. I'll continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: PDXGrae

customer_reviews.title: Best locks ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best locks I have used! I bought some recently and I could barely make out the #s. These, you can see clearly! The button is nice and big, smooth release. The cable is a good length. I bought it for my grab and go bag which I keep important docs in. I also bought that "pink box" bag which I love! (that first aid patch I added for deterrent, it doesn't come with that.) You just can't beat this lock and getting 2 in the pack was a no brainer. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: TSA "check" pop tabs are great!
customer_reviews.text: Held up nicely on my Pelican cases. Just did a European tour with them, 8 different flights and they survived. It's nice having the "TSA Checked" notification pop tab as they went through one of the cases on its way back to my final flight. Good to know! They obviously packed everything back wrong, forced the case closed and broke a piece of equipment. Filed a claim immediately at my destination as soon as I picked them up at baggage claim thanks to seeing the lock!
customer_reviews.author: St.Jeezy

customer_reviews.title: High quality, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These travel locks are simply very high quality. The lock digit tumblers mechanically have a nice, solid feel when I rotate each digit. The locking wire loop is covered with a plastic coating (to reduce scratching, noise, etc.). It's simple to program in your own custom number. The instructions are clear. The lock does has a slight heft to it, but is not overly heavy. Basically these locks are very high quality, clearly attention has been paid to the details, they feel, look, and act solid. Given the high-quality, the price is reasonable. I recently ordered more of these locks. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Strong, solid, even the TSA 'alert' worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our large checked suitcases for a TransAtlantic flight recently. One indicated that it had been checked by TSA and, sure enough, there was a TSA tag inside the bag when we opened it. The locks are strong and solid, and the cables were just barely long enough to go through two sets of zippers for the main compartment and the front zippered compartment of the luggage so I didn't have to use 2 locks! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Good lock but too big for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I returned it solely because I think it’s too big for my needs on my suitcase. I should have paid closer attention to the dimensions and possibly drawn it out before ordering. I prefer the smaller locks to avoid snagging it in transition on my smaller case.
customer_reviews.author: lconnierh

customer_reviews.title: These ARE the Luggage Locks You're Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I had ordered one set of these locks. After receiving them (very promptly, by the way), and examining them up close for quality, durability, ease of use, etc., I ordered a second set. They're super easy to use. The directions for setting your custom combination could not be more clear and direct. The lock itself is sturdy and durable, and I love the SearchAlert feature!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for international travel
customer_reviews.text: This was a great lock for travel. Very easy to use. Indicator worked when it was opened by TSA. I’ve used it on multiple international trips. Unfortunately I just had my second one missing when I picked my bag up at my final destination. Both times it made it to the US (saw it before I turned in for final leg). Oh well. I’ll be purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Red color is nice for helping you find your luggage at the airport
customer_reviews.text: These are nice so far, replacing a pair of black ones we used for a while. The red helps them stand out some at baggage claim so it's a bit easier to see your luggage. I've seen people having some issues with these (easy to open, can open with a paperclip, etc) but I haven't had that issue and not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: The #1 lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel lock ! In particular, I like the flexible cable. It is also a bit longer than a regular hasp, so I can lock two or more adjoining zippers together. This means I can use it on a waist pack or anything else with zippers and an open pull. I also like the shape of this lock. When you fasten it on luggage, it lies flat. It will not get knocked around like a regular luggage lock can. The numbers are large and clear and changing the combination is a breeze. I also like the TSA red/green indication. No little lock will totally protect anything, but it is a deterrent and will prevent a casual encounter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The way companies should be!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the luggage locks sturdy and attractive, the Tarriis customer support is fantastic. I had a slight problem (totally my fault) setting my lock numbers and emailed customer support after 10 pm. I expected to get a canned response sometime in the next week, but had a very nice personal (and helpful!) reply within minutes!! I will, and am, buying from this company again and highly recommend them. Beyond that, the Tarriss website has many helpful and useful travel related blogs for the sometimes or constant travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: No key or code needed to unlock.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective lock or if all TSA locks are lock this but I can stick anything in the keyhole and unlock without correct code. Dont even need a key. It I just for looks and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Easy stylish and strong
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different brand and the reset combination wouldn’t work this brand was perfect! The newer cable lock is a great feature that can go through older zipper pulls ( might need to increase the hole) but again is stylish and strong
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burkot

customer_reviews.title: Locks are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Just received these, wished I had ordered them years ago. While I do travel a lot, these will be a great help. I changed the combination right away and it was easy to do. The locks are sturdy but now too heavy. My suitcases have been searched by TSA and wish I would have had these so it would not be a surprise when I opened my suitcase and find the paper inside that it had been searched. In fact,I found the paper from TSA was placed on the bottom of my suitcase when I emptied it. Now I can;t wait to go somewhere so I can use my new locks.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Locks.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 2 sets of these and have used on multiple trips. I don't put anything of value in my suitcases that are checked anyway, but having the peace of mind that the random baggage handler can't quickly open and "check" for goodies is why I lock the bags. I like the cable versus a lock with inflexible metal hasp allows you to pull more parts into a single lock. These are attractive and easy to use. Just bought 2 more for my back pack which I use when touring around various to discourage the pickpockets which are so prevalent in many big cities. Bottom line: Great little locks that do the job intended.
customer_reviews.author: Pbear-Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for low light situations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see. Sort of a pain (balancing act) to set the code. Super easy to use. I like that the release button is on the side. Unfortunately the TSA or airline - who really knows - took it on the first flight. But hey, it came with two in the pack! I noted that it is easy to see because in low light I had difficulty seeing the numbers on my wife's lock. I had no such issue with this one. You don't realize how nice that is until you are trying to unlock it! It is a decent size too. Big enough to easily handle, but not so big that it gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: The lock performs as described. Used both, one ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock performs as described. Used both, one on each bag, to travel the day after I received them. Upon arrival at my destination, Discovered that one lock indicated that the lock had been opened. Inside the bag, the TSA had placed a flyer indicating that they had opened the bag for inspection. They other bag had no such flyer and the lock did not indicate that it had been opened. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Into the wild

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly. I prefer the round design actually. When they open, the cable pops right out- easy! No problem with setting the new combination as long as you read the directions. I'd buy again. Great holiday gift if you need a filler for a traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The best TSA Lock we have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best TSA Locks. I have ordered many different brands and now I will only order this one. I have tried the ones with the combo on the side and it is 50 50 at best if you put the combination in just perfectly. These are very easy and I have never messed up a combination because they don't make it a guessing game. Perfect! I use them for shipping out crates and they come back perfectly every time. I also use them on the plane for products and with out fail every time our bags get checked by TSA. It lights up red so you know they went through your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Behan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: One lock worked well and the other one got its code set when I didn't set it to and I can't get it undone. The one that does work, is working great and I would buy these again. Update: I had a problem with the lock and customer service was excellent. They fixed the issue super quick. I would absolutely do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set & unlock. No key necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to lock my suitcase while I was in Mexico. Last time I was there the housekeepers helped themselves to my clothes. Yes, they stole some of my clothes. So I learned my lesson and got these locks to avoid that from happening again. These worked great. Easy to set and unlock. I tested to see if the just randomly unlocked and mine did not. I loved that I didn’t have to tote around a key to unlock these.
customer_reviews.author: Mallow Moo

customer_reviews.title: Security -- with added bonuses
customer_reviews.text: The locks arrived on time and in good order and the delivery was supplemented by conscientious follow up emails to check on these things. Along with the email came some handy travelers tips about ways to avoid theft and insurance problems in the event of lost or stolen whole bags. Since I have previously found that Delta were completely inept at handling their loss of a bag, these tips were very useful, especially the tips about ways to ensure full payment on insurance by way of a couple of simple precautions that I would otherwise never have thought of.
customer_reviews.author: SWD

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and my first use the TSA went thru my bag but it was great to know this prior to leaving the airport so I could make sure my belongings were not damaged. That little indicator worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: MistiB

customer_reviews.title: A TRAVEL MUST
customer_reviews.text: I for one prefer to have my checked luggage with a lock on the zipper so the zipper is not pulled and the contents of your luggage spilled out and/or lost. I have no objection to TSA checking my luggage, I just don't want the zipper mistakenly pulled open,
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: TSA cut off four locks
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these. On three separate flights, TSA removed the locks. In one instance, I had two locks on the bag to use in the hotel. So the bag was not even locked. TSA removed both. So I bought four locks and now I do not have any. I am puzzled but I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Traveling around the world I’ve always thought of locks to discourage opportunistic theft (or someone adding something) while in line etc. Obviously if someone has the time, they will get into your bags if they really want. I’ve travelled with these locks and they serve the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM

customer_reviews.title: Drop the price!
customer_reviews.text: Should be priced $5 a piece considering the size and quality of these locks. I can't recommend their product for the price when other locks have the same "TSA alert" system that shows when TSA open the lock for less. It does stick a little when trying to release the lock, not sure if its a new lock thing.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN R. VEGA

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought a pair for my wife's luggage. Three things separate these TSA approved Tarriss locks from others; 1. They are very substantial and secure, 2. The numbers on the tumblers are large and easily visible, 3. The company, Tarriss, stands by their products 100%. I was so impressed by these locks, I purchased 4 more for my gun cases and luggage. Smart purchase if you value security, visibility and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: 1 of the 2 unusable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, one of the two pack arrived in unworkable condition. After trying to set combination and open the lock, it fell apart in my hands. The other one was fine, worked immediately. Makes the value about 50% of price paid as one was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: LibrariesRule

customer_reviews.title: TSA
customer_reviews.text: Strictly for luggage lock. The first time i used my two locks, on a plane, someone in TSA checked one of our bags and kept the lock! So I purchased another two. Now I have a spare. I like these locks. Would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simon

customer_reviews.title: One of the lock wont open with the default code.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack. However only one of the locks can open with the default 000. I am unable to open the lock. I have contacted tarris by no response. Update A customer representative contacted me and offered to replace the lock. The new locks are working perfectly. Will see how they keep up when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: sherryberryxoxo

customer_reviews.title: These locks are easy to use and reset
customer_reviews.text: Update: I just returned from a ten day trip overseas and the TSA did open and inspect both my bag and my husband's. The indicators on the locks were clearly red. These locks are easy to use and reset. They are sturdy and fulfilled their purpose. I bought two more locks for another trip and they worked as above. Please be advised however, that any determined thief can break into luggage even if if it locked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Locks I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a backpack. I've been to numerous hostels, people's homes, buses, trains, cars, hitchhiking, airports and more. I've never had a problem. Yes I'm sure these aren't 100% secure and my be easily defeated as some reviews point out. But that's not the purpose of these locks. They are a deterrent. And they work very very well!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Appears sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Seems really sturdy used on an international flight (meaning luggage changed planes a couple times) and these locks survived. Like the thin wire as compared to heavy hasps as it's easier to thread through zipper tabs. It seemed my luggage was not searched because I didn't see the TSA alert change. Like the side button to push in when unlocking rather that having to wiggle it around to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have locks for air travel
customer_reviews.text: These are great luggage locks. I have already purchased these in black but these blue ones are a great color. It’s the perfect way to secure your checked in luggage as the TSA can open it with a special tool and these locks have an indicator that lets you know if it has been opened or not.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought for locking a wallet- hooks through the zipper and the handle loop to secure the zipper from moving. Easy to set and use- if the person isn’t familiar with TSA locks, it will keep my contents safe for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Locks works great! Alerts of TSA check and resets well.
customer_reviews.text: The Tarriss TSA Luggage Locks work great. Very simple to use and set your own combination. Two locks per pack, which is very convenient. I used it for a long 13 day trip in Italy and had zero issues with it. Sturdy lock that can withstand airport employees packing bag with other and baggage claim conveyor belts. Alerts with a simple red signal of a TSA search and resets back to green setting after a quick reset. Strong, durable product that is dependable to keep luggage safe.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Fresnedo

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard to Properly Lock
customer_reviews.text: I started my trip with 2 of these, and only arrived with one on my luggage. Either I didn't lock it properly or TSA is stealing them! I pulled and tugged in every direction after I had to lock on my luggage, but somehow it was not there when my bag arrived in Miami.
customer_reviews.author: lmoon

customer_reviews.title: non consistant quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock due to high rating reviews. After receiving the lock and set the combination, one of two locks got stuck and I could not open it though the procedure was correct. Call to get a replacement and returned the products. I thought it was the bad luck the first time, but this time again one of the locks got stuck, the other one was fine. Finally received the third shipment, this time finally works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy locks
customer_reviews.text: Love these locks. Nice and sturdy and the dials are large and easy to read. Bit of a pain to set at first with having to hold the side button in while at the same time setting the combination. Don't let that side button out until you are done setting the combo or you will end up with a random number that you didn't plan to select! Impressed that I received an e-mail from the Tarriss company thanking me for the purchase and to contact them should there be any issues with the locks. I will enjoy using these locks on my travels!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our upcoming trip. Setting up your own code was a breeze. One of our luggages was checked by TSA, thanks to the indicator on the lock. Having to reset it was easy as well. Will definitely purchase more of these locks.
customer_reviews.author: Jan3t

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I've just returned from an overseas trip and these locks worked wonderfully. Easy to program and to open, lightweight but sturdy and protected by a TSA tool which is the only way it can be opened except with the passcode. I'm recommending them to my friends who travel frequently.
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: While a bit pricey these locks are robustly made and easy to use. Due to deteriorating eyesight I need luggage locks whose dials were very easy to set and read. These locks fit the bill 100% - no regrets. One potential minor downside is that compared to standard luggage locks with a metal shackle these are a significantly bigger and a bit heavier. This gives you some more flexibility in locking various bag types but the added size is noticeable. Something you should be aware of if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set combination from factory setting.
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy this brand again. Difficult to set. Came in packaging set at 000 and one would not open. Second one took 2 of us to set new combination. Used it on suitcase for airplane trip. Must have pulled off suitcase in transit which telks me this is flimsy lock. So... one is lost and other won’t open. Now have to purchase 2 new locks - again.
customer_reviews.author: LAHUNT

customer_reviews.title: Quality made and quality customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of these locks. I received a two pack and one of the locks wouldn't open after resetting the combo. I contacted the company and they responded right away and offered to send me out a new set. The new set arrived promptly and work perfectly! The item is quality made and easy to use. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pugsrule3

customer_reviews.title: Quality product & company
customer_reviews.text: Locks work great. Easy to change combination. Exactly as described. Customer attention is outstanding! Received emails with travel tips even before locks arrived. After arrival a question was answered within hours on a Sunday evening. I would love to work for such a caring and quality company. High praise from me & a big thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my GF since she has blue colored luggage. I had previously got them is black for myself and liked the way it was easy to open by just pressing the side of the lock. Having flexible loop made it easy to maneuver around more than one zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must haves if you fly a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this lock twice now and love the feeling that my belongings aren't accessible to anyone except the TSA agents if they feel there is a need to check my contents...and I love knowing if they did or not by checking for a possible red light. :) Very easy to change the initial code to the owner's specific code. If I ever need more than these 2 locks, I won't hesitate to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Solid TSA locks
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Love the bigger digits for these older eyes... Hopefully these last longer and don't get broke by the baggage handlers or TSA. Last time, the lock was not relocked correctly. These will at least tell me if they were opened by someone with the access key.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted for our Europe trip! (or any traveling)
customer_reviews.text: TAS Approved, easy to use and gave us the peace of mind of safety! Yes, the cable can be cut easily... but if you have it locking your backpack in a busy/packed environment (Train, bus, elevator, crowded street, etc) you WILL know if someone trying to tamper with the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Fredericka N Thompson

customer_reviews.title: After several horrible TSA locks purchased from the store last minute
customer_reviews.text: After several horrible TSA locks purchased from the store last minute, decided to buy this one for international trip. Have been using it for last 10 days and So far its working great! love the flexible wire lock. I have used it on both my carry on and checked in luggage. Love the feature of green to red light to let you know if TSA has opened your bags - Have not gotten to experience it first hand yet,
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel locks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect locks. It was easy to change the combination. The thin and long wire made it a snap to thread through the holes in my luggage's zippers. I like that it's not only TSA compliant, but that you can also see if TSA unlocks them.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Finally a lock you can read!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a lock you can read! Large contrasting numbers make it easy to see unlike the normal chrome number wheels that reflect the light to make it very hard to read. The larger size and loop diameter is perfect too. Thanks Tarriss!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gertsen

customer_reviews.title: Good locks.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they have bigger loops and can secure around different sizes of bag handles/zippers. Work great. Haven’t used them on a trip yet, but they appear to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've used yet!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and have bought a few locks in my journies... These are a perfect size, easy to work with, large numbers printed and don't need tiny hands to operate. I like the green/red window to indicate if TSA opened the lock. Feels solid. I highly recommend. Fair value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We like these a lot. Travel often and these are excellent. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Retired2014cool

customer_reviews.title: Awesome luggage locks!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several different brands of luggage locks and have finally found one which is super, super easy to set your own combination code. In addition, the black background is so much easier to read the numbers than the chrome background for many of the luggage locks. The reflection of the light against the chrome background makes it very difficult to read the numbers. BTW, the Seller sent a very helpful and informative follow-up email with tips. It definitely highlight the way the lifetime warranty can be invalidated.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed Lock
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lock. Spring loaded and also has a well-constructed feel. I am glad two are supplied. I hear TSA sometimes cuts off a lock to get into a bag. It is good to carry a spare. Great value. Bill
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Secure and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Keeps airport workers from going through your undergarments. TSA left a nice little calling card to say they had inspected. You can buy suitcases with these already attached to the suitcase. These let you know who has been through your luggage, however.
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Very good locks.
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a couple of sets of these for a trip to Guatemala. Product is stylish and well designed. Appears sturdy and rugged, yet rather sleek. The number dials feature large, easily seen numbers. Instruction for setting code is well written and easily understood. In order to set code you will need a paperclip or other pointed object to depress the set button which is slightly recessed. Customer service and follow up from the mfgr is great. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Earle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 5 stars even though we were unable to use the locks as they did not fit through the zippers our Samsonite suitcase. I tend to think that this may be a Samsonite problem and not a defect in these really well-made locks. However, the customer service from this company was amazing - not only did they refund my money, but they offered me a substantial discount on another set of locks. As we are leaving the country in the morning I was unable to take advantage of this, but I will not hesitate to use this company again later.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Worked great !
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for a trip overseas. I travel quite a bit and I’ve seen other people with similar locks. They worked great. I even used them for the gym and for daily security of my computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: A. estala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect to locking points on luggage
customer_reviews.text: Recent long distance travel with luggage loaded to maximum stretch and the cables on these locks allowed for easy connection ..felt very secure
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Combination was loss, cant open after...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loss combination of 2 locks .. I went thru all 1000 combination's and fail to open the lock.. Just spend the extra money and buy fingerprint keyless lock next time.
customer_reviews.author: P and Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use - TSA-Approved
customer_reviews.text: Since TSA has a key, they can get into one’s bag without destroying one’s lock. Lock itself is simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Calabash Style

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: The locks are sturdy and work smoothly and, once you've reset the combination, they are easy to use. Resetting the combination requires opening the lock and using a ballpoint pen or something similar to press in the recessed reset button as you change the combination.
customer_reviews.author: ACG

customer_reviews.title: Best Locks Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These locks are excellent, I don't know how I got along without them! They are easy to use and the locked end pops right out at the push of a button when you press it after putting the combo in. Easy to read dial and it turns easily. No more fumbling with hard to read numbers and lock ends that are clumsy and hard to use. Thank you so much for this product! Best locks ever and well worth the price. So glad I have an extra for my carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and use locks - better than the other choices
customer_reviews.text: Locks arrived promptly. Upon receipt, reset the locks to my own combo (you should always do this as the default all zeros is an invitation for theft). Locks work smoothly. much easier to read than many others. four stars because I have not had a chance to field test them yet - though they look like they will be much better than the others available on the market.
customer_reviews.author: eagle eye

customer_reviews.title: Happy as a Clam!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The cable makes this lock more versatile that other types that have a smaller, rigid locking loop, so I can use it on more items. It's easy to use and works well. My only complaint (minor) is that it's just a bit awkward, trying to hold the lock and keep the combination-change pin depressed while changing the combination from the factory setting. All in all, though, totally happy with this lock and with the seller, who followed up with some additional travel security tips and suggestions.Shipment was very fast as well. Thinking about buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Cuban8

customer_reviews.title: A Great TSA Style Lock for Luggage
customer_reviews.text: A great lock which is easy to use & set your own combination. This lock was a better choice than their competitors locks as the hook is flexible & will not snap off like the other types of locks when handle by baggage handlers of most airports which are not too gentle with your bags. The tell tale indicator is very useful to see if the TSA have inspected your bag without you being there, & is able to be reset for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Morovic

customer_reviews.title: Lock seemed to work fine, but the first time I actually used it
customer_reviews.text: Lock seemed to work fine, but the first time I actually used it, the TSA cut it off and it was gone forever. I got a nice note in my bag about how they did not seem to think this was one they could open???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work, but not sure for how long
customer_reviews.text: So far they have lasted on 6 trips, but one of them, the steel cable began to detach where you push the cable into the lock.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: steel locked are still the best in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: when we got our luggages the locks weren't even there. its not secure enough. maybe the lock got pulled or something and just fell of. I ordered 3 sets of these and we use 4 locks total and we lost 3 when we got our bags from the baggage carousel. don't buy. your wasting money. steel locked are still the best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Krishtina Alcoran

product_meta.title: Tarriss TSA Luggage Lock with SearchAlert (2 Pack) (Blue)
feature_bullets: 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED and backed by our LIFETIME WARRANTY! Makes a Great Travel Gift! Secure you luggage, and your peace of mind, from thieves on the plane, in the airport and in your hotel room with this 2 Pack of TSA Cable Locks with SearchAlert. These TSA Locks are recognized and accepted by TSA agents ensuring they can inspect your checked bags without having to cut off your locks which would leave your belongings vulnerable to theft. See SPECIAL DEALS further down page.
SEARCH ALERT - You'll always know when the TSA is rummaging through your bags. Indicator changes from Green to Red when the TSA opens your lock!

EASY to READ 3 Dial Combination can be set and rest to any combination of your choosing for added security. Large dials with easily visible numbers make it easy to line up the numbers correctly, even for the hard of seeing
FLEXIBLE CABLE allows for easier threading through luggage zippers
STURDY, DURABLE and DEPENDABLE. Our TSA Locks were designed with durability in mind and are made from a high strength Zinc Alloy to provide a lifetime of security and peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,401 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
